name: Notion | Goal Planner
description: Conquer your resolutions with the Resolution Board - track progress, break down steps, and reflect on your journey. Stay focused, motivated, and accountable. Unlock your potential.Introducing the Resolution Board - the ultimate tool to help you conquer your resolutions and achieve your goals! This innovative board is designed with three powerful features to keep you on track, motivated, and accountable. Track Your Goal Progress: Say goodbye to scattered notes and disorganized to-do lists. features: 5 Goal Settings Templates [PRO Version].Including SMART Goal, OKR Goal, W.O.O.P Goal, One Word Goal, and our Goal Settings Template.; Set and track Milestones [PRO Version].Allowing you to monitor your progress on milestones level.
